ingredient.name: Chia seeds
ingredient.description: Omega-3 rich seeds with soluble fiber and anti-inflammatory properties

microbiome_effects.mechanism: Prebiotic fiber supports beneficial bacteria growth and SCFA production
Soluble fiber fermentation promotes SCFA-producing bacteria

metabolic_effects.mechanism: Increases acetate butyrate and propionate production with improved gut barrier function

symptom_effects.population_notes: Reduces gut inflammation and improves digestive symptoms with metabolic health support

citations.title: Effect of Chia Associated with High-Fat Diet
